大麻热潮唤醒了科罗拉多州沉睡的恐龙这个小镇距离同名国家纪念碑只有很短的车程，没有太多东西。雷龙大道和剑龙高速公路这两条主干道上分布着几个加油站、一家酒类商店和一家小型汽车旅馆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Pot-boom-wakes-sleepy-Dinosaur-Colorado.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Pot-boom-wakes-sleepy-Dinosaur-Colorado.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03bb931a-7582-4625-a68f-974b8843747e Mon, 25 Sep 2023 08:07:32 -0400 Pot boom wakes sleepy Dinosaur, Colorado
官员们一致同意：利用和解资金遏制青少年成瘾行为。但“如何”变得很棘手。去年，科罗拉多州拉里默县三名青少年因芬太尼过量死亡，震惊了整个社区，并“让家庭发生了翻天覆地的变化”，该县公共卫生主任汤姆·冈萨雷斯 (Tom Gonzales) 说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Officials-agree-Use-settlement-funds-to-curb-youth-addiction-But-the-e28098howe28099-gets-hairy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/Officials-agree-Use-settlement-funds-to-curb-youth-addiction-But-the-e28098howe28099-gets-hairy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d1eb5ec-d1f7-4edf-8363-27a5a2903245 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 08:01:48 -0400 Officials agree: Use settlement funds to curb youth addiction. But the ‘how’ gets hairy.

3DHISTECH 和 Epredia 开设病理学创新孵化器，加速癌症诊断的进步匈牙利 3DHISTECH 和 PHC 集团成员（总部位于日本）Epredia 两家领先的病理学和诊断公司宣布在布达佩斯开设病理学创新孵化器，以开发更快、更精确地诊断癌症和肿瘤病变的方法和设备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/3DHISTECH-and-Epredia-open-pathology-innovation-incubator-to-accelerate-advancements-in-cancer-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230925/3DHISTECH-and-Epredia-open-pathology-innovation-incubator-to-accelerate-advancements-in-cancer-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a6b6640-ee94-476f-aafd-7b092a85f8e1 Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:05:00 -0400 3DHISTECH and Epredia open pathology innovation incubator to accelerate advancements in cancer diagnostics
